item.title: How can i make the npc say me forums all the time --
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:


                    if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) { //npc id
                        if (misc.random2(2) <= 2) { //how often it should say it
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "Join #blahblahblah.forum.forum#"; //what to say
                        }
                    }

in NPChandler.java

Just search for

npcs[i].textUpdate = "

then under

                        }
                    }

add the code i gave you at top. 

                    if (npcs[i].npcType == 225) {
                        if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "Icon Minigame!";
                        }
                    }
                    if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) { //npc id
                        if (misc.random2(2) <= 2) { //how often it should say it
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "Join my forum"; //what to say
                        }
                    }
